external_games.name: Apocalypse Hotel: The Thin Blue Line!

name: Apocalypse Hotel: The Post-Apocalyptic Hotel Simulator! - The Thin Blue Line!
summary: As if zombies, mutants, and aliens weren't trouble enough, everyday humans are now causing trouble on the streets. Help the re-established Swansea Police Force deal with this troublesome humans by repairing and renovating their police station, and by supplying them with a Policeman's Lounge at your hotel for them to relax after work.
